title: flansmod导致服务器崩溃，求大神解决~~
author: flyrealmoon
txt_content:
{:10_522:}客户端玩的好好的，但是一把枪械MOD加到服务器里，服务器用一会就崩溃，求大神帮忙看下原因~~~~~~~附crash：

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't do that.

Time: 10/2/14 9:09 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop

java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception in server tick loop
